<urn:PaymentAuthorizationCreateRequest> <urn:cpsAuthorizationMessage> <urn1:cpsUserAuthorizationData> <urn2:agreementData> <urn3:agreementId>${Properties#Value}</urn3:agreementId> <urn3:bankId>${Properties#bankId}</urn3:bankId> <urn3:customerID>${Properties#customerid}</urn3:customerID> <urn3:productID>${Properties#Key}</urn3:productID> </urn2:agreementData> <urn2:userId>${Properties#UserID}</urn2:userId> <urn2:sessionID>4744001</urn2:sessionID> <urn2:firstName>Test</urn2:firstName> <urn2:lastName>Cust</urn2:lastName> <urn2:userAccount> <urn2:role>Appprove</urn2:role> <urn2:role>Salary</urn2:role> <urn2:role>Transfer</urn2:role> <urn2:approvalLimit>${Properties#approvalLimit}</urn2:approvalLimit> <urn2:numberOfApprovers>${Properties#numberOfApprovers}</urn2:numberOfApprovers> <urn2:bookingLevel>${Properties#bookingLevel}</urn2:bookingLevel> </urn2:userAccount> <urn2:userAccount> <urn2:accountNumber>${Properties#CreditAccountNumber}</urn2:accountNumber> <urn2:accountOwnerIdentifier>${Properties#accountOwnerIdentifier}</urn2:accountOwnerIdentifier> <urn2:currencyCode>${Properties#currencyCode}</urn2:currencyCode> <urn2:accountType>CoreAccount</urn2:accountType> <urn2:role>View</urn2:role> <urn2:role>Register</urn2:role> <urn2:role>Appprove</urn2:role> <urn2:role>Salary</urn2:role> <urn2:role>Transfer</urn2:role> <urn2:approvalLimit>999999</urn2:approvalLimit> <urn2:registerLimit>999999</urn2:registerLimit> con:request.name: SOConfirm
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:wsc="http://edb.com/ws/WSCommon_v21" xmlns:urn="urn:srv.stord.fs.evry.com:ws:standingorder:v1_5" xmlns:urn1="urn:srv.stord.fs.evry.com:domain:standingorder:v1_5"> <soapenv:Header> <wsc:AutHeader> <wsc:SourceApplication>${Properties#SourceApplication}</wsc:SourceApplication> <wsc:DestinationApplication>${Properties#DestinationAPP}</wsc:DestinationApplication> <wsc:Function>paymentAuthorizationCreate</wsc:Function> <wsc:Version>1.0</wsc:Version> <wsc:ClientContext> <wsc:userid>${Properties#UserID}</wsc:userid> <wsc:credentials>${Properties#credentials}</wsc:credentials> <wsc:channel>${Properties#channel}</wsc:channel> <wsc:orgid>${Properties#orgid}</wsc:orgid> <!--Optional:--> <wsc:orgunit>4201</wsc:orgunit> <!--Optional:--> <wsc:customerid>${Properties#customerid}</wsc:customerid> <!--Optional:--> <wsc:locale>en</wsc:locale> <wsc:ip>1.1.1.2</wsc:ip> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <wsc:item key="AgreementId" value="${Properties#AgreementId}"/> <wsc:item key="PaymentChannel" value="INT"/> <wsc:item key="LogRef" value="adf5b284-e1c6-4c7a-8a69-b3f4404f8e47"/> </wsc:ClientContext> </wsc:AutHeader> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <urn:standingOrderStatusUpdateRequest> <urn:standingOrderKey> <urn1:agreementId>${Step2_BalanceBelowSOCreateWithPM#Response#declare namespace ns2='urn:srv.stord.fs.evry.com:domain:standingorder:v1_5'; declare namespace ns3='urn:srv.stord.fs.evry.com:ws:standingorder:v1_5'; //ns3:standingOrderCreateResponse[1]/ns3:standingOrderKey[1]/ns2:agreementId[1]}</urn1:agreementId> <urn1:agreementVersion>1</urn1:agreementVersion> </urn:standingOrderKey> <urn:standingOrderAction>CONFIRM</urn:standingOrderAction> </urn:standingOrderStatusUpdateRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
